We regularly hold competitions. You can find a list of competitions both in Berkeley, and in the general Northern California region on the West Coast Cubing website.
In Berkeley, we aim to hold at least 2 weekday competitions a semester, and at least 2 weekend competitions a semester, but this depends on room bookings.

title: DeCal

content:
Welcome to the website of the Rubik’s Cube Club at Berkeley! We are a student group that promotes the growth of speedcubing in the Bay Area. We hold regular competitions and teach a Decal.
We have weekly meetings at Hearst Field Annex B5 on Monday from 8-10 PM (Fall 2024), excepting days when there is no class. Anyone is welcome to drop in! We also have a discord, which we use for communication. Sometimes we talk about club logistics, but we mostly just cube. Official membership is reserved for UC Berkeley students and alumni.
To know what our events/competitions are during the semester, you can find them on our calendar link.
All our communication is through Discord. If you have any questions, please ask us there! We’re still a very active club, so we’ll respond very quickly there.
In case you don’t have Discord, feel free to contact us at berkeleycubeclub@gmail.com for any questions.
